entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle and a few flurries ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
